https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/ezN62UzjIDhvTmBAaS9trBxJoLQ.jpg Restaurant hostess and mom Joanne Sanders has to work late one night. After she leaves the restaurant she accidentally cuts a car off on the highway. This driver takes it personally and he begins to stalk and harass Joanne. A Deadly Encounter
